title: 21 "You Hate to See It" On Cognitive Dissonance & Being Humbled on this Journey
description:
In this episode, we dig into why exactly it is that we think we view ourselves one way one moment but demonstrate behaviors that show otherwise the next. We get into things like why we it's easy for us to learn about and understand principles of self love but difficult for us to center it into our core being. Tune in for the tea!

 

Click here to get my new e-book the 3 Steps to Radical Self Forgiveness

...or click here to get a preview first :) 

 

Please don't forget to rate & review!

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com

 

Book of the Month mentioned in this podcast: Heart & Hustle by Patricia Bright
